data.title: Residence Services
data.text:
AMAZON PACKAGES

Amazon lockers securely store your packages until you are ready to pick them up – 24 hours a day – at no additional cost. Packages will be stored for three days before they are returned for a refund. Lockers can be used by anyone with an Amazon account.

How to add a locker to your account

Log in to Amazon and go to Your Account

Click Your Addresses and then Add Address

Select Find an Amazon collection location near you

Choose the locker most convenient for you:

Leaf Hopper is located outside Lister Residence

Palanqueta is located outside the St. Joseph's College Women's Residence

Yaron is located outside International House

Other packages to Lister

Check your mailboxe for a package pick-up slip and bring it to the Student & Guest Services desk along with your ONEcard to retrieve your package. Your package will be held for 7 days before it is returned to sender.

To ensure a smoother delivery of your package, please use the name that is on your ONEcard and include your mailbox number. If the name on the parcel is incorrect, it will be returned to sender.
